_source.text: 3 Yukon Gold potatoes, or as many as you want to eat in a sitting 3 or 4 tablespoons olive oil or sunflower seed oil 1/2 cup plain yogurt (I used 2% Liberté, though the author says full-fat is better, just don't use use the thick, strained kind) 2 tablespoons crumbled Greek feta cheese 2 to 3 teaspoons Dijon mustard Plenty of Aleppo pepper (I used close to a tablespoon) 1 tablespoon of white wine vinegar
